description:
At the law firm of Avanzino & Moreno, PC, we represent the people of Brooklyn, New York, in legal cases related to personal injuries. Since 1992, we have offered results, commitment and respect to those who have been injured by the carelessness of another. We provide free initial consultations to all potential clients and do not charge any fees until money has been recovered.

Along with Brooklyn and New York City, we also represent the people of Staten Island, The Bronx, Manhattan and Queens. Our law firm handles many types of personal injury, including the following:

  • Construction accidents
  • Nursing home neglect and abuse
  • Automobile accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Premises liability
  • Negligence supervision
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Trip and falls
  • Wrongful death
  • Civil litigation
  • Negligent security
  • Product liability
  • Workplace injuries
  • Assault and battery
  • Dog bites

As we have recovered millions of dollars for our clients, we have also gained insight into how drastically a personal injury can affect the life of an individual and their family members. Whether through a settlement or a trial, we are prepared to go the distance on each case to secure compensation for the injured.

The law firm of Avanzino & Moreno, PC, is associated with the American Bar Association, the American Association for Justice, the New York State Bar Association, the Women's Bar Association of the State of New York and the Brooklyn Bar Association. We are happy to make hospital and home visits, and our representatives are fluent in both English and Spanish. A personal approach combined with experience and knowledge makes us the ideal choice for anyone who has been injured by another.
